formattedAddress: 80 Beekman St, New York, NY 10038, USA
adrFormatAddress: 80 Beekman St, New York, NY 10038, USA

originalText.text: We are so glad that Bright Beginnings has an after school program for local PS kiddos. My son absolutely loves going here after school to play and learn. They always do wonderful activities like science experiments, yoga and play in a private playground. There is something new every day with good planning by the teachers. They are kind and the kids talk so highly of them. He always comes out happy and chatting about what they did that afternoon! Cannot recommend enough!

originalText.text: Bright Beginnings is fantastic. The staff is caring, creative, attentive, and communicative. My daughter loves the pre-K aftercare and while she didn't go here as a toddler, I've heard nothing but rave reviews. She often leaves so excited to tell me about the science experiments, yoga, art making, adventures in the basement ball pit, and more. Highly recommend!

text.text: Bright Beginnings is fantastic. The staff is caring, creative, attentive, and communicative. originalText.text: We've been to many preschools in the downtown area and this is our favorite. The staff is very caring, and also understanding of working parents busy schedules.   The teachers and staff are very responsive -  they return messages immediately.  Additionally, the children don't just have fun at school, they're actually getting enrichment.  The school shares the weekly lesson plans - and I can tell from my children's vocabulary that they are learning too!

text.text: We've been to many preschools in the downtown area and this is our favorite. The staff is very caring, and also understanding of working parents busy schedules.   The teachers and staff are very responsive -  they return messages immediately.  Additionally, the children don't just have fun at school, they're actually getting enrichment.  The school shares the weekly lesson plans - and I can tell from my children's vocabulary that they are learning too!

originalText.text: There aren’t enough words to describe how brilliant this preschool is. Our daughter is thriving beyond what we could’ve imagined. Every teacher, Miss Hunter, Mr Nick and Miss Allison, is so genuinely and deeply interested in each child’s growth and development, in getting to know them, in helping them flourish and blossom and celebrating their unique individual personalities. Allison Tylek, the Education Director and sometimes teacher in the classroom, is above and beyond in all that she does for the parents and our children. Down to even taking the time and effort to advise, help and encourage us with sleep training. Among other developmental stages in our toddler’s life. Our daughter loves them all so much! WE love them all so much! She literally skips and runs to school because she’s so excited and happy to be there. The facilities are also fantastic! Large open classroom with lots of natural light, an enclosed, safe and private outdoor playground and an onsite indoor playground with climbing walls and ball pits! Amazing all round! I’m just so grateful to all of the wonderful staff there. Happy mama, happy dad and most importantly happy toddler! We will definitely also be continuing to send our daughter here for their after school program once she’s enrolled in 4K. Best preschool ever!!

originalText.text: We LOVE Bright Beginnings for our son, Otis. The teachers are so lovely, hands-on, and fun. The classroom is bright and stimulating, and you can see the kids in the window! We are so glad we chose to do the 2s/3s program here. Otis has thrived since starting school, and can't wait to see his progress continue. Thank you BB!!
